subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jack Kemp, the former housing secretary, congressman, vice presidential nominee and Buffalo Bills quarterback, has cancer, his office said. A statement issued in Washington said Kemp was undergoing tests to assess the origin of the disease and the treatment. It did not disclose the type of cancer. Kemp, 73, said he would continue to serve as chairman of his Washington-based Kemp Partners consulting firm and would remain involved in charitable and political work.
